data.enText: a long period of time when there is little or no rain

data.chText: 有记载以来最严重的旱灾之一
data.enText: one of the worst droughts on record

example: farmers most affected by the drought hope that there may yet be sufficient rain early in the growing season
when England defeated Pakistan it ended a ten-year drought

value.def: A drought is a long period of time during which no rain falls.

example.ex: Drought and famines have killed up to two million people here.
example.tran: 旱灾和饥荒夺去了这里200万人的生命。

example.ex: He told a press conference that Spain was suffering one of the worst droughts of the century.
example.tran: 他在记者招待会上说西班牙正遭受着本世纪最严重的旱灾之一。
